topic.title: Generating WebHelp Output with Transformation Scripts

body.p: provides the ability to generate WebHelp output by using transformation scripts outside Oxygen XML Editor/Author to obtain WebHelp output from DITA and DocBook documents. The WebHelp output files created with the from an external script are the same as the output files produced when you run DITA or DocBook to WebHelp transformation scenarios from within Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
